name: TinyLinkMenu

:data.description: Set the data for the favorites menu
:data.description_zh: 设置收藏夹菜单的数据

default-expand-all.description: Set whether to expand all nodes by default when opening the menu pop-up window, which is true by default
default-expand-all.description_zh: 设置打开菜单弹窗时默认是否展开所有节点，默认为 true

ellipsis.description: If the menu content is very long, it is omitted and defaults to true
ellipsis.description_zh: 菜单内容超长时省略显示，默认为 true

get-menu-data-sync.description: Customize the menu data service to return data directly
get-menu-data-sync.description_zh: 自定义菜单数据服务，直接返回数据

:icon.description: Customize the icon for the node to expand the collapse
:icon.description_zh: 自定义节点展开折叠的图标

keep-selected-nodes.description: After the content is selected in the tree node, click the cancel button to open the pop-up window again to see whether to retain the status of the content checked before unchecking, which is true by default
keep-selected-nodes.description_zh: 树节点勾选内容后，点击取消按钮，再次打开弹窗是否保留取消前勾选的内容的状态，默认为 true

:max-item.description: Set the maximum number of columns that can be favorited
:max-item.description_zh: 设置可收藏的栏目的最大数量

title.description: Set the title of the Favorites menu, which is empty by default
title.description_zh: 设置收藏夹菜单的标题，默认为空

wrap.description: When the menu content is very long, it is displayed in line breaks, and the default is false
wrap.description_zh: 菜单内容超长时换行显示，默认为 false

methods.name: sureNodevalue
methods.params: 获取选中的菜单节点并关闭菜单弹窗，同时展示选中的菜单

description: LinkMenu 收藏夹形式的菜单，支持可配置菜单项。
description_zh: LinkMenu 收藏夹形式的菜单，支持可配置菜单项。
